statement.tex: %text Solve the following differential equation \[ \quad (x^2-1)\frac{dy}{dx} + 2xy = \frac{1}{x^2-1}, \vert x\vert \neq 1\] %
\\ %text Which of the following is true \underline\text{about A} in the following? \[ \quad \underbrace{ (x^2-1)\frac{dy}{dx} + 2xy}_A = \frac{1}{x^2-1}\] %
\\ %text Given that \[ \frac{d}{dx}\lbrace (x^2-1)\cdot y\rbrace = \frac{1}{x^2-1}\] what will \underline\text{y evaluate to?} %
